mapper.select:
SELECT PE_IDX, PE_CODE, PE_STATE, COM_NAME, PE_NAME, FORMAT(PE_COUNT , 0) AS 'PE_COUNT', FORMAT(PE_COST , 0) AS 'PE_COST', PE_FILE, PE_FILE_NAME, CONCAT(PE_START, ' ~ ', PE_END) AS 'PE_PERIOD', PO_ESTIMATE.CREATED_BY AS 'CREATED_BY', PO_ESTIMATE.CREATED_DATE AS 'CREATED_DATE', PO_ESTIMATE.MODIFIED_BY AS 'MODIFIED_BY', PO_ESTIMATE.MODIFIED_DATE AS 'MODIFIED_DATE' FROM po_estimate LEFT JOIN company ON PE_COM_IDX = COM_IDX WHERE PE_IDX IS NOT NULL
LIMIT #{start},#{length}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM po_estimate LEFT JOIN company ON PE_COM_IDX = COM_IDX WHERE PE_IDX IS NOT NULL

SELECT P_IDX, P_NAME, brand.CATE_NAME AS 'BRAND', category.CATE_NAME AS 'CATEGORY', P_SELL_PRICE, FORMAT(P_SELL_PRICE , 0) AS 'P_SELL_PRICE_COMMA', PEP_COUNT, PEP_COST, FORMAT(PEP_COUNT * PEP_COST , 0) AS 'SUM' FROM po_estimate LEFT JOIN po_estimate_product ON PE_IDX = PEP_PE_IDX LEFT JOIN product ON PEP_P_IDX = P_IDX LEFT JOIN category AS category ON P_CATE_IDX = category.CATE_IDX LEFT JOIN category AS brand ON P_CATE_IDX2 = brand.CATE_IDX WHERE PE_IDX = #{peIdx} AND PEP_IDX IS NOT NULL

AND PO_DUE_DATE BETWEEN SUBSTR(#{poDueDate}, 1, 10) AND SUBSTR(#{poDueDate}, 13)

AND PO_AS_DATE BETWEEN SUBSTR(#{poAsDate}, 1, 10) AND SUBSTR(#{poAsDate}, 13)
AND PO.CREATED_DATE BETWEEN SUBSTR(#{createdDate}, 1, 10) AND SUBSTR(#{createdDate}, 13)
AND PO.CREATED_DATE BETWEEN SUBSTR(#{createdDate}, 1, 10) AND SUBSTR(#{createdDate}, 13)
AND PO.MODIFIED_DATE BETWEEN SUBSTR(#{modifiedDate}, 1, 10) AND SUBSTR(#{modifiedDate}, 13)
AND HW_APRV_DATE BETWEEN SUBSTR(#{hwAprvDate}, 1, 10) AND SUBSTR(#{hwAprvDate}, 13)

mapper.select:
SELECT PO_STATE, U_NAME, BUY.COM_NUM, PO_TOTAL_AMOUNT, PO_SELL_PROFIT, PO_SELL_TOTAL_AMOUNT, PO_DELIVERY_MAIN, PO_IN_DATE, PO_DUE_DATE, PO_REFUND_DATE, PO_AS_DATE, PO_BUY_SELL_PERIOD, PO_REPURCHASE, po.CREATED_BY AS 'CREATED_BY', po.CREATED_BY AS 'CREATED_DATE', hiworks.HW_APRV_ID AS 'HW_APRV_ID', hiworks.HW_APRV_DATE AS 'HW_APRV_DATE', po.MODIFIED_BY AS 'MODIFIED_BY', po.MODIFIED_DATE AS 'MODIFIED_DATE' FROM po LEFT JOIN company AS BUY ON PO_COM_IDX = BUY.COM_IDX LEFT JOIN company AS SELL ON PO_SELL_COM_IDX = SELL.COM_IDX LEFT JOIN hiworks ON PO_HW_IDX = HW_IDX LEFT JOIN user ON HW_U_IDX = U_IDX
LIMIT #{start},#{length}
SELECT * FROM PO LEFT JOIN HIWORKS ON PO_HW_IDX=HW_IDX LEFT JOIN warehouse ON PO_WH_IDX = WH_IDX LEFT JOIN company ON PO_COM_IDX = COM_IDX
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PO LEFT JOIN HIWORKS ON PO_HW_IDX=HW_IDX LEFT JOIN warehouse ON PO_WH_IDX = WH_IDX LEFT JOIN company ON PO_COM_IDX = COM_IDX

SELECT * FROM PO LEFT JOIN HIWORKS ON PO_HW_IDX=HW_IDX
LIMIT #{start},#{length}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PO LEFT JOIN HIWORKS ON PO_HW_IDX=HW_IDX
SELECT PRODUCT.* ,PO_PRODUCT.* ,PO.* ,PP_COST * PP_COUNT PP_TOTAL FROM PO_PRODUCT, PRODUCT, PO WHERE PP_PO_IDX = #{po_idx} AND PP_P_IDX = P_IDX AND PP_PO_IDX = PO_IDX ORDER BY PP_IDX

mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM PO_PRODUCT, GOODS, PO_RECEIVED

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PO_PRODUCT, GOODS, PO_RECEIVED

SELECT *, (PP_SELL_PRICE * PP_COUNT) - ((PP_PROCESS_COST + PP_FIX_COST + PP_PAINT_COST + PP_COST) * PP_COUNT) AS 'TOTAL_PROFIT', ROUND((PP_SELL_PRICE * PP_COUNT) - ((PP_PROCESS_COST + PP_FIX_COST + PP_PAINT_COST + PP_COST) * PP_COUNT) / (((PP_COST + PP_PROCESS_COST + PP_FIX_COST + PP_PAINT_COST) * PP_COUNT) * 100), 1) AS 'PROFIT_PER'
FROM po_product LEFT JOIN product ON PP_P_IDX = P_IDX LEFT JOIN category ON P_CATE_IDX2 = CATE_IDX WHERE PP_PO_IDX = #{poIdx}

SELECT CONCAT(SPECL_NAME, ':', SPECL_VALUE) FROM po_product LEFT JOIN spec ON PP_SPEC_IDX = SPEC_IDX LEFT JOIN spec_item ON SPEC_IDX = SPECI_SPEC_IDX LEFT JOIN spec_list ON SPECI_SPECL_IDX = SPECL_IDX
WHERE PP_IDX = #{ppIdx}

SELECT CONCAT(SPECL_NAME, ':', SPECL_VALUE) FROM po_product LEFT JOIN spec ON PP_SPEC_IDX2 = SPEC_IDX LEFT JOIN spec_item ON SPEC_IDX = SPECI_SPEC_IDX LEFT JOIN spec_list ON SPECI_SPECL_IDX = SPECL_IDX
WHERE PP_IDX = #{ppIdx}

SELECT * FROM product LEFT JOIN po_product ON P_IDX = PP_P_IDX LEFT JOIN po ON PP_PO_IDX = PO_IDX LEFT JOIN goods ON G_PO_IDX = PO_IDX AND G_P_IDX = P_IDX WHERE PP_PO_IDX = #{po_idx} AND G_IDX IS NOT NULL

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product LEFT JOIN po_product ON P_IDX = PP_P_IDX LEFT JOIN po ON PP_PO_IDX = PO_IDX LEFT JOIN goods ON G_PO_IDX = PO_IDX AND G_P_IDX = P_IDX WHERE PP_PO_IDX = #{po_idx} AND G_IDX IS NOT NULL
